Author: mermaid_butt
Text: Focus on the person you love, not the dress. You don't even have to wear either of those...it is your wedding after all.

Author: Alexithymia115
Text: Hey just FYI the tailoring process for a wedding dress takes multiple times because brides are NOTORIOUS for changing their weight before a wedding. It ain't just you it's EVERYONE lol. So I hope that helps you feel less bad about this fitting? And try to focus on the real reasons you're getting married. Not the dress but the person you love, the life you're creating together etc etc.
